summary: Simon, re: teased video
mainText: 'Alright, everyone voted against posting the full video (including myself), so I'll post a heavily edited version and give some context.'

summary: Slikey, re: modding
mainText: 'I can't because it doesn't exist in Minecraft. This will be the biggest issue of Hytale modding: People have to leave their Minecraft modding brain at the door and accept new paradigms. There are many differences that will be confusing at first contact.'

summary: Paris, re: Big Dude/Slamma song
mainText: 'Beautiful song, thank you both for making it :)'

summary: Slikey, re: modding
mainText: 'It really shouldn't be too hard to imagine how it will all function in the vision if someone researches Unreal Engine, Roblox and Minecraft. Yes the concept for Hytale UGC is new but none of the parts are new and we are just bundling it all together into a vision that we believe is striking the balance between empowering, compatible and accessible.'

summary: Slikey, re: modding
mainText:
'As we follow the Unreal Blueprints model, you will be able to create new visual nodes with your own Java Logic and use those nodes in visual scripting easily. All of these things are solved conceptually in Unreal Engine.
The client side visual scripts will be more limited but also just focus on better client prediction and some basic UX improvements which are less critical for now.'
